vclaim: In June 2021, Chinese health officials reported that a 41-year-old man living in Jiangsu Province had contracted H10N3 avian influenza, also known as the “bird flu.”
title: Yes, China Reported the First Known Human Case of H10N3 Bird Flu
subtitle: It may be the world’s first human to be infected with the H10N3 strain of avian influenza.
author: Madison Dapcevich
